translation: Janaka and others attained perfection indeed through action alone; even with the intention of protecting the masses, you should perform action.
commentary: 3.20 Karmana by action? Eve only? Hi verily? sansiddhim perfection? attained attained? Janaka and others? Lokasamgraham protection of the masses? Evapi only? sampashyan having in view? to do to perform? Arhasi thou shouldst.Commentary Samsiddhi is Moksha (perfection or liberation). Janaka? (Asvapati) and others had perfect knowledge of the Self? and yet they performed actions in order to set an example to the masses. They worked for the guidance of men.
